Language.Text:
Ripley, do you like horrors?
Some ...
This here reminds me of one ...
Shall we split?
I'm going this way.
Hello, Jones, I'm locked in here!
Hey, me too over here!

Ice ball is perfectly slippery and if it starts to move, only an obstacle will stop it. In addition, if possible, it rolls around circular objects. Watch out, its impact is dangerous.
Balloon floats, therefore floors have no effect on it.
